Shader
public class GLShader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shader

Manages OpenGL shaders. This class will be used in the "Textures and Shading" project.

load

public void load(java.lang.String vertexFileName,
                 java.lang.String fragmentFileName)
          throws java.lang.Exception
Load the vertex and fragment shader programs from a file.

Specified by:
load in interface Shader
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

use

public void use()
Activate the shader program. As long as the shader is active, the vertex shader is executed for each vertex, and the fragment shader for each pixel that is rendered.

Specified by:
use in interface Shader

disable

public void disable()
Disable the shader and go back to using OpenGL standard functionality to process vertices and fragments/pixels.

Specified by:
disable in interface Shader
